game.name: Balloon Crazy Adventure
game.description:
This beautiful balloon always had a dream of travelling around the world. One day it left his area for a new and very exciting tour without having an idea about what to meet on the road. Things went into its favour and it got an opportunity to flew on its way. During its most awaited trip, it went through the grass world, the cloud world, the morden world and the sea world. It looks like a crazy adventure is going to be experienced during this trip. So, what are you waiting for? Join Balloon Crazy Adventure to have fun together!

The problem is that the balloon also challenged the big boss, spiky ball, rocket, thunder and the bomb. This arises the question in our mind if the balloon will be able to finish this travel. Well, it does not make his dream come true without your supporting hands. Join this lovely balloon and get an opportunity to enjoy a lot in this free online platform game! With 20 different wonderful levels, each level offers unique fun and thrill to its users. 

Make sure to guide the hot air balloon to its destination point while avoiding all the obstacles and helping it to land on the landing pad. The spiky mines, the opposing weather conditions and sharp beaks are there to restrict you from completing the job. Get it through them carefully while collecting coins along the way in this cool fly game! Hurry up, boys! 10 amazing bonus levels are waiting for you! Play and set your own record in this one of the best adventure games for boys!
